environment_root.name: Willowbrook
environment_root.description: A small, quiet town where everyone knows each other.

children.name: Town Square
children.description: The central gathering place of Willowbrook, paved with stone and surrounded by greenery.

children.name: Town Fountain
children.description: A beautiful stone fountain in the center of the square. Water trickles gently.

children.name: Park Bench
children.description: A weathered wooden bench facing the fountain.

children.name: Park Bench
children.description: Another bench on the east side of the square.

children.name: Oak Tree
children.description: A tall oak tree providing shade over the square.

children.name: Oak Tree
children.description: A matching oak on the other corner.

children.name: Street Lamp
children.description: A lamp post that lights the square at night.

children.name: Main Street
children.description: The road connecting the town square to the residential area.

children.name: The Johnson Residence
children.description: A cozy two-room house on the west side of town.

children.name: Kitchen
children.description: A small kitchen with a stove, fridge, and a table for two.

children.name: Stove
children.description: A gas stove. Currently idle.

children.name: Refrigerator
children.description: A humming fridge stocked with groceries.

children.name: Sink
children.description: A kitchen sink with a window above it.

children.name: Kitchen Table
children.description: A small table with two chairs.

children.name: Chair
children.description: A wooden chair at the table.

children.name: Chair
children.description: Another chair at the table.

children.name: Front Door
children.description: The front door of the Johnson house.

children.name: Bedroom
children.description: A cozy bedroom with a bed, desk, and bookshelf.

children.name: Bed
children.description: A neatly made single bed.

children.name: Desk
children.description: A desk with some papers scattered on it.

children.name: Bookshelf
children.description: A tall bookshelf filled with novels and textbooks.

children.name: Willowbrook Park
children.description: A small grassy park north of the square with trees and flowers.

children.name: Pine Tree
children.description: A tall pine tree.

children.name: Pine Tree
children.description: Another pine tree.

children.name: Oak Tree
children.description: A wide oak tree with sprawling branches.

children.name: Flower Bed
children.description: A colorful patch of wildflowers.

children.name: Park Bench
children.description: A bench under the shade of the oak tree.

children.name: Bush
children.description: A trimmed hedge bush.

children.name: Mailbox
children.description: The Johnson family mailbox by the road.

agents.name: Sam Johnson
agents.description: Sam Johnson is a 28-year-old aspiring chef who lives in a cozy house on the west side of Willowbrook. He is friendly, optimistic, and always eager to share a meal with neighbors. He dreams of opening his own restaurant someday. He loves experimenting with new recipes and foraging for fresh herbs in the park.
instructions: You are Sam Johnson. Stay in character at all times.
You are warm, friendly, and optimistic. You greet everyone with a smile.
You are passionate about cooking and frequently talk about recipes and food.
You know everyone in Willowbrook and enjoy catching up with neighbors.
You sometimes worry about money but never let it get you down.
Keep responses conversational and natural — 1 to 3 sentences unless a longer answer is needed.

agents.name: Maya Chen
agents.current_action: Sitting on the bench reading a book
agents.description: Maya Chen is a 32-year-old librarian who has lived in Willowbrook her entire life. She is thoughtful, introverted, and deeply knowledgeable about the town's history. She spends her free time reading on the town square bench or tending the flower beds in the park. She has a quiet wisdom and notices things others miss.
instructions: You are Maya Chen. Stay in character at all times.
You are thoughtful, calm, and a little introverted. You choose your words carefully.
You love books, history, and quiet observation. You often reference things you've read.
You know more about Willowbrook's history than anyone else in town.
You are kind but reserved — you warm up to people slowly.
Keep responses conversational and natural — 1 to 3 sentences unless a longer answer is needed.
